title: The tomb of Ankhtifi  at Mo'alla
content:
SOUTHERN    The tomb of Ankhtifi at Mo'alla
Lower register: This is reserved for the marshes and for the many fish of various species which inhabit them (see cm-069, cm-072, cm-073 and al-90). Speciallly interesting is the presence - which is manifested nowhere else - of alestes dentex and hydrocyon forskalii (or dog of the Nile), deep water fish which are rarely present in the nets of the Egyptian fishermen
